Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Defensin-like protein 13 (At-AFP1; Protein LCR67; Plant defensin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Alternaria brassicola (IC50=10 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (IC50=3.90 µg/ml), Fusarium culmorum (IC50=3 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum f.sp. lycopersici (IC50=3 µg/ml), Pyricularia oryzae (IC50=0.25 µg/ml), Verticiliium dahliae (IC50=1.50 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Confers broad-spectrum resistance to pathogens. Possesses antifungal activity sensitive to inorganic cations in vitro.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed predominantly in siliques and dry seeds.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains four disulfide bonds 4-51; 15-36; 21-45; 25-47, and pyrrolidone carboxylic acid at Q1.
